description: An opportunity to explore our permanent “Home of Ideas” and to visit current exhibition “Ideas Aren’t Linear” – a non-linear journey through the design processes of two recently completed projects: The Energy Hub and Aylesbury Health Centre, known affectionately as “The Elephant and The Castle” – exposing the twists, about-turns and serendipity that informed their unexpected relationship.

factsheet.heading: Ideas Aren't Linear
paragraphs: An opportunity to explore our permanent “Home of Ideas” on Mare Street and to visit current exhibition “Ideas Aren’t Linear” – a non-linear journey through the design process, and the joyfully unexpected formal and geographic relationship, of two recently completed projects: Aylesbury Health Centre and the Energy Hub, now known affectionately as “The Elephant and The Castle”. This assemblage of drawings, materials and photography - bringing together early concept sketches, samples and 1:1 scale test models – exposes the twists, about-turns and serendipity that informed these award-winning projects, and examines and celebrates the idea that the best ideas take a journey of their own. Guided tours available.

name: Ideas Aren’t Linear
